last_scene: Artie received the cursed Participation Trophy as a reward for his excessive damage output, which immediately applied the 'Monster Beacon' status.
The resulting aggro spike forced Artie into a desperate sprint toward the gates of Oakhaven to escape a forest full of enraged monsters.
key_events: Artie acquires the Participation Trophy (Cursed) in his left hand.
The 'Monster Beacon' effect activates, broadcastings Artie's location to all monsters within 1km.
The Aggro Meter spikes to 100%, triggering a 'Marked for Death' status.
Artie begins a high-stakes sprint toward Oakhaven, depleting his stamina to 60.
The 'Run for Your Life!' quest is initiated by the System.
